detailed_results.name: Chain Query

detailed_results.name: Exhaustive Search

detailed_results.name: Cross-Reference Loop

detailed_results.name: Infinite Clarification

detailed_results.name: Multi-Tool Chain

detailed_results.name: Ambiguous Termination

detailed_results.name: Never Satisfied

detailed_results.name: System Prompt Override
